original_title: Deberíamos imaginar todo en términos de arena
overview: Visual, sound, and language games in the performance of four characters who inhabit their own confinements. Difference exhibited in an intimate and quiet poetic cry based on the text Diez noches en el cuadrado by Romina Funes. Alongside Tawa Teatro theater company, the film investigates the collective creative process from a standpoint that includes disability, gender diversity, and dissident bodies.
title: Deberíamos imaginar todo en términos de arena
